docs.snippet: Bad P.R. is only part of it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bad P.R. is only part of it.
docs.abstract: Ian McGugan It's the Economy column contends the bad press received by National Football League is unlikely to affect football's popularity; maintains the NFL and football have one of the most micro-managed brands in sports, in part because of the financial incentives that exist.

headline.main: What’s the N.F.L.’s Incentive to Change?

docs.snippet: Coach Tom Coughlin, quarterback Eli Manning and the Giants have an uncanny mastery in N.F.L. games played in October....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach Tom Coughlin, quarterback Eli Manning and the Giants have an uncanny mastery in N.F.L. games played in October.
docs.abstract: New York Giants, their coach Tom Coughlin and quarterback Eli Manning all have an uncanny mastery in NFL games played in October; Manning has the best record (30-7) in October among all NFL quarterbacks during the Super Bowl era; Coughlin is 33-8 in October since becoming the Giants’ coach in 2004, and in those 11 seasons, no other NFL coach has a higher October winning percentage.

docs.snippet: A Halloween-themed hayride loaded with passengers crashed down a hill in the Maine woods and slammed into a tree, fatally injuring a teenage girl and leaving more than 20 other people hurt, police said Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Halloween-themed hayride loaded with passengers crashed down a hill in the Maine woods and slammed into a tree, fatally injuring a teenage girl and leaving more than 20 other people hurt, police said Sunday.

headline.main: Teen Dead, More Than 20 Hurt in Hayride Crash
headline.print_headline: Teen Dead, More Than 20 Hurt in Hayride Crash

docs.snippet: The fadeaway of the suburban Islanders has begun as the N.H.L. team prepares to play its final season in Nassau County before moving to Brooklyn....
docs.lead_paragraph: The fadeaway of the suburban Islanders has begun as the N.H.L. team prepares to play its final season in Nassau County before moving to Brooklyn.
docs.abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column says the fadeaway of the suburban New York Islanders has begun as the NHL team prepares to play its final season in Nassau County before moving to Brooklyn; many Islanders fans are treating move to Brooklyn as end of the world.

headline.main: Staying on the Island, but Moving a World Away
headline.print_headline: Staying on the Island, but Moving a World Away

docs.snippet: A restoration expert in Allentown, Pa., has only one customer: Nicola Bulgari, the Italian jewelry magnate, whose collection focuses on workaday prewar American models....
docs.lead_paragraph: A restoration expert in Allentown, Pa., has only one customer: Nicola Bulgari, the Italian jewelry magnate, whose collection focuses on workaday prewar American models.
docs.abstract: Profile of auto restoration expert Keith Flickinger, whose lone customer is the Italian jewelery magnate Nicola Bulgari; Flickinger maintains Bulgari's extensive collection of classic American cars, which focuses on workaday prewar models.

headline.main: Rough Gems, Brought to a Fine Polish
